main.name: Jeff Lung
main.description: Welcome to my portfolio website which is enhanced by React JS and hosted on Github
main.bio: I am an experienced designer who has worked in different posts before, like Graphic Designer, Multimedia Designer and Web Designer through my 20 years career life. The first company I worked for was an Advertising company in Hong Kong. I learnt a lot of basic knowledge from this work in the almost 9 years work time, from Graphic Design, Web Design and Development, Animation, and Video editing. Moreover, the second company was a corporate in medical business in Hong Kong, and I have learnt the substantial design experience for a large scale company group. Furthermore, my latest work position was a Web Designer which provided me a chance to work with web technology on the Front-end part.
main.bio2: I am competent with most of the Adobe suite softwares, like Photoshop, Illustrator, Aftereffect, Animate and Dreamweaver. Moreover, I also worked by using Maya, from modelling to the rendering procedures.
main.bio3: In my pastime, I like to explore up-to-date techniques of website coding because I enjoy to express the aesthetics through the web media, such as animation and the website layout. In fact, I was inspired to enter the Design field by viewing a website of my favourite designer, Eric Jordan, in 2000. His website '2Advanced V3' is composited with techy visual style and some impressive cyber animations for opening and web pages transition, and this kind of aesthetics is still what I prefer for design.
main.bio4: On the other hand, I love movie and video game as well. The other person I admire a lot is a Japanese video game creator, Hideo Kojima, as he is a pioneer combining video game interaction into a deeply story telling approach. Through playing Kojima's Metal Gear Solid series, I started to concentrate more on storytelling and camera work in video game, and GTA from episode IV is also my favourite. Afterwards, I enjoy immerse myself in video game with a convoluted plot and compelling dialogues, because I could experience with movie in a playful way and this is immersive for me to another world. All in all, I believe as a designer, we could convey our message with different kind of media such as website, video, game with some sort of storytelling approach.
main.bio5: Otherwise, I like doing exercise like jogging and Tai Chi also. As I could sweat a lot while I am jogging and this could rejuvenate my mind and body, while Tai Chi could help my mind to be refreshed and staying calm which could help a better state for work.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I am competent with most of Adobe suite softwares and I worked by using Maya as well.

education.school: Coventry University (Jointly run with School for Higher and Professional Education)
education.description: Through this program, I learnt usability, coding skill, multimedia softwares advanced usage, marketing skill through a movie business model. The final project gave me a chance to learn Unity3D to create my first short mobile game demo in Android.

education.school: School for Higher and Professional Education of VTC
education.degree: Professional Diploma in Game Design & Production
education.description: In this program, I learnt basic theories for pc game production like concept art, 3D softwares, programming, and it also covered some mobile game knowledge.

education.degree: Certificate in 3D Computer Animation and Modeling
education.description: This program covered general knowledge for using Maya from modeling to rendering, we could make motion graphic animation in the course.
This program taught me building realistic character in Maya and create animation with it. The lecturer usded Bruce Lee as the model as he is well known for making 3D animation with this movie star.

education.school: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
education.description: This course started from Graphic Design theory to software applications for graphic design, web development and video editing. It helped me to build a solid fundamental knowledge for my designer career.

testimonials.text: I have been Jeff's supervisor for almost 7 years, Jeff did a good job in his position, and was responsible  for web supporting including HTML, web interface, web banner and icon design, etc. Jeff is organised and highly responsive to his duties with good manner He is reliable who can accomplish his tasks successfully. I believe that Jeff will be a valuable teammate to the work of any institution.
testimonials.user: Stanley Yam, Creative Director of Dreamshub Limited

testimonials.text: Jeff was mainly responsible for maintaining and updating our company's website and answering to all our questions pertaining to our IT needs. During the period Jeff has proven himself to be profoundly knowledgeable and skill ful in getting his job done. We are also extrememly satisfied with Jeff's positive and hard-working attitude. We have found him as a responsible, responsive, effective and efficient partner to work with. We have no reservation in recommending Jeff to whoever who can utilize his skills in the IT and online marketing field.
testimonials.user: Gary Chow, Managing Director of Nu/Hart

testimonials.text: Jeff was responsible for the preparation of design project especially at the on-line marketing material such as Banner Ad, 3D Animation, E-mailer, Websites & Video Editing etc. Apart from being a good team member, Jeff also displayed considerable initiative and approached his work thoughtfully and intelligently. Jeff also impressed me of being able to rise above the call of duty on certain occasions and was more than capable of taking up extra responsibilities.
testimonials.user: Anson Tam, Art Director of Town Health Management and Services Limited
